paragraphs: As a cloud-based web developer, I have a wealth of knowledge and experience in the Microsoft stack, including Azure Services, ASP.NET, and .NET Core/Framework. Additionally, I am well-versed in Javascript and Typescript, making me a versatile and skilled developer. I also have experience developing applications with the Nuxt framework and Progressive Web Applications (PWA).

My passion for both frontend and backend development has led me to master a variety of frameworks, including Angular, React, and Vue for creating interactive user interfaces, and .NET Core and NodeJS for building high-performance APIs.
With a background in building business projects and designing features that are easy to maintain and control, I bring a wealth of experience and expertise to any project.

When I'm not working, I keep myself busy with a variety of hobbies, including cybersecurity (with a focus on web security), listening to podcasts about the world of technology, and staying fit and enjoying nature, particularly through cycling.
